metadata.name: Silver Pass #001
metadata.description: The MetaVineyard Club connects wine and spirits producers and consumers through a variety of digital wine collecting initiatives. This launch of curated wine NFTs is your opportunity to own premium wine and spirits from Pont des Arts. The MetaVineyard Club Pass grants you early exclusive access to the MetaVineyard Club with added benefits of receiving multiple NFT drops from the Pont des Arts Collections. Only 300 passes will be available on OpenSea. This is your chance to become a wine connoisseur and Age-to-Earn in Web 3.0. Visit www.metavineyard.club for more details.
